You may have gone to a non-existent page!
 Check that the link is correct.

not-supported.title: Not Supported
not-supported.description:
Unfortunately, our application only works from a computer. 
We will add support for mobile devices later. 
Sorry for the inconvenience.

features.subtitle:
Packed with powerful tools, our app makes it effortless to display and
customize your Valorant stats. From seamless setup to full
personalization, we've got everything to make your stream shine.
features.title: Everything You Need to Elevate Your Stream

getStarted.title: Get started with VALORY today
getStarted.subtitle: Join thousands of content creators who have improved the quality of their broadcasts with using our tools.

left.description: Track Your Game, Own the Stream

configurator-home.title: Choose best tools for your stream.

drag.description:
Click and drag with your mouse
 to adjust the position.
drag.title:
Position the overlay as you like
 for the perfect broadcast layout.

preview.main:
Your preview will be located here.
Please enter your profile to see it.

profile.title: Profile
profile.description: Set up your profile before you start. This is necessary for the application to work.

configuration.description: Adjust available options of the chosen variant to reflect your brand.
configuration.title: Configuration

features.first:
Customize your overlay according
to your stream.
features.second:
There is support for many popular
streaming programs like OBS and others.
features.third:
Configure once, enjoy seamless
operation forever!

generate.description: Copy the URL below and paste it into your streaming app (in OBS Studio: Sources ‚Üí Browser).
generate.title: Overlay URL

header.description:
Catch your audience's attention 
with real-time Valorant stats!

description.valorant: Customizable Valorant overlay with rank, stats and progress display
description.spotify: Overlay for displaying current Spotify track on stream
description.counter_strike: Dynamic Counter-Strike overlay showing ranks, live stats, and match performance
description.fortnite: Customizable Fortnite overlay with real-time stats, match history, and victory tracking
description.crosshairs: Showcase user crosshairs for games and create your own custom crosshair to use in-game
description.settings: Manage your personal settings, PC configurations, and in-game peripherals
description.chat: Smart chat bot for audience interaction
description.notification: Automatic notifications about stream start and important events

source.subtitle:
Our application's source code is fully accessible on GitHub.
We welcome everyone to view, utilize, and contribute to its development.
source.title: Open Source

streamers.subtitle:
Top Valorant streamers already showcase their stats with our app.
Want to see your name here? Log in to our platform. We might feature you next!
streamers.title: Streamers Spotlight
